Hello Hagop,

We are delighted to confirm your enrolment on: OMNISTART eLearning

Please visit the link <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=3499&section=1>  to start exploring the programme.

For further support, please contact us here chalhoub.university@chalhoub.com <mailto:chalhoub.university@chalhoub.com> .

Enjoy your learning journey!
Chalhoub University Team
